SEARCH
Package GP.src

Class Restaurant

java.lang.Object
GP.src.Restaurant
public class Restaurant extends Object
Class creates restaurant (used for multiple restaurants in a chain)

Class used to add and remove different aspects of the restaurant (staff, table)

Author:
Kevin Collins invalid input: '&'invalid input: '&' Olan Healy
